facebook.title: How bills to replace Obamacare would especially harm women
facebook.summary:
Before Obamacare, only 12% of individual market policies covered pregnancy expenses.

Obamacare made that coverage mandatory, but now Republican plans to replace it would allow states to waive that requirement.

An expert on health care looks at that, and
